axisDirection.description: The axis direction containing the color configuration to represent.

axisId.description: The id of the axis item with the color configuration to represent.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

direction.description: The direction of the legend layout.

params.name: params
params.description: The bound of the piece to format.

string | null.name: string | null
string | null.description: The displayed label, '' to skip the label but show the color mark, or null to skip it entirely.

labelPosition.description: Where to position the labels relative to the gradient.

onItemClick.description: Callback fired when a legend item is clicked.

index.name: index
index.description: The index of the clicked legend item.

end.nodeName: the legend with the labels after the color marks

extremes.nodeName: the legend with the labels on the extremes of the color marks

inlineEnd.nodeName: the legend with the labels inlined after the color marks

inlineStart.nodeName: the legend with the labels inlined before the color marks

maxLabel.nodeName: the list item that renders the maxLabel

minLabel.nodeName: the list item that renders the minLabel

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

start.nodeName: the legend with the labels before the color marks
